data.message:
Going along my morning, Liking comments I agree with, when suddenly WHAM! 

"You're Temporarily Blocked

It looks like you were misusing this feature by going too fast. You've been blocked from using it."

So, how fast is too fast? Is there a ballpark figure or something, so I know just how many comments I can show my support of (or disgust with) without getting a 24-hour reacting banhammer? What's the point of having the ability to react to things if we can't freaking do it?

replies.message: Hey Stephanie. It sounds like you overused a feature. Hold tight! In the meantime, you can read more about Facebook policies at: http://bit.ly/2uKB5bx. -Ashley
Yeah, I know I overused it. Your little page there doesn't answer my questions. 😑
